title: How to transfer Spotify songs to Apple Music, and more
content:
If you’ve ever thought about switching your Spotify subscription to Apple Music, Pandora, YouTube Music, Deezer, or vice versa, one thing that probably made you change your mind is “how am I going to transfer all my songs from a streaming service to another?” Well, here’s the answer.

more…

The post How to transfer Spotify songs to Apple Music, and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: With the FreeYourMusic app, it's possible to easily transfer your Spotify songs to Apple Music, Pandora, YouTube Music, Deezer, and more.
